synopsis.text: In the year 2097, humanity faces a grave threat from a mysterious digital virus in the high-tech metropolis of Neo Hong Kong. This aggressive virus can infect both humans and machines, turning them into violent monsters driven by a singular impulse to spread the infection. An elite taskforce called S.T.A.N.D. represents the last line of defense, armed with advanced battlesuits known as Variable Gears. Led by the enigmatic Raven, they wage war against infected humans and rogue machines alike. The story follows a young man named Serge who harbors a burning desire for revenge against Raven. After a fateful encounter pits him against an infected machine, Serge unwillingly joins the ranks of S.T.A.N.D. - his impressive latent skills awakened. As a member of the team, Serge confronts the dangers of the digital plague. But he also uncovers secrets about his hidden strengths and origins, all while an ominous force known as the Incubator seems intent on replacing humanity with a new viral lifeform. In Neo Hong Kong's struggle for survival, Serge may be the wild card that tips the scales.
